about_the_game:
Glukhovo is a first person psychological horror game, featuring disturbing gameplay and an unsettling and compelling narrative.

Visiting your grandfather in the remote village where you spent your childhood. Sounds great, doesn't it? But this doesn't bode well for indie horror. Returning to his native village, Marlen will have to relive his childhood fears and past regrets.

Adventure awaits.


Each of us has our own Glukhovo. A long-abandoned place from your childhood. Sometimes your younger memories come flooding back and you feel like you need to see the place again. So Marlen decided to go to his native village to visit his grandfather, whom he had not seen for 10 years. While exploring the abandoned village, you will get to know its inhabitants, who left an indelible mark on Marlen’s life.

Death is somewhere nearby.


Regrets and fears create monsters. Ghosts of the past await you in every dark corner. To escape from them, you will have to be smart. Otherwise - try again. But don't worry, you can always save the game.

Horror without notes.


A photo album is like a monument to a person. This is the story of their life. Looking at old photographs you can learn a lot about a person. Collect all the photos in an album and find out what happened to the people in the photographs.

Have a piece of paper and a pen.


The game contains various puzzles. Some are easy to solve, while others will require you to rack your brains.

name: Glukhovo Demo
short_description: Sometimes, regrets come too late. When you're over 40, you start to rethink your life. You remember people and events that completely changed you. I will tell you 7 stories that happened to me in childhood, after which I became a different person.
